https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tF4G2OcH3A7EGv3zwQd6r6uyMEf.jpg "Boris Becker - The Player" is a rousing and emotional portrait of one of the greatest German sports heroes ever! It shows us the person Boris Becker up close: We experience him as a privateer, trainer, businessman and as a loving husband and father. Boris Becker - The Player
